370320.name: SEED OF LIFE
370320.description:
SEED OF LIFE is a relaxing puzzle game in which you create beautiful and enlightening spirographic patterns.

Adjust the size and speed of each of the spinning rods to recreate wonderfully unique patterns to satisfying and beautiful interactive audiovisual feedback.

Features
  • Hundreds of pre-built puzzles
  • An infinite number of procedurally-generated patterns
  • Soothing dynamic audio
  • Dazzling interactive visual feedback
  • Sacred geometry: Slick, intuitive interface and animations
  • Wallpaper-mode: watch as patterns morph into each other to beautiful sounds and visuals
  • Creator-mode: play with the spirograph and create your own patterns with no goals

The butterfly effect is the idea that small changes can have wildly unpredictable outcomes. As you play SEED OF LIFE, you will witness in real-time just how small alterations to parameters in the spirograph can dramatically affect the pattern it produces.
370320.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 保加利亚语, 丹麦语, 芬兰语, 匈牙利语, 韩语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 泰语, 土耳其语
